title: Ola announces 'BOSS sale', offering electric scooters from Rs 49,999
description: Ola Electric has launched its BOSS sale with exclusive deals, including the S1 model at Rs 49,999. The sale comes amid a decline in Ola's monthly sales and market share, as competitor brands TVS Motor and Bajaj Auto gain ground with comparable pricing and newer models.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
